tasks.label: Build (Debug)
tasks.command: cmake -S . -B _build -DCMAKE_BUILD_TYPE=Debug && cmake --build _build -j4 && mv _build/phi ./ && mv _build/phid ./ && dsymutil ./phi && dsymutil ./phid

tasks.label: Cleanup
tasks.command: mv _build/compile_commands.json ./;rm -rf _build/ && mkdir _build;mv ./compile_commands.json _build/;rm -f phi phid; rm -rf phi.dSYM phid.dSYM; rm -rf .cache

tasks.label: Format
tasks.command: find src -type f \( -name "*.c" -o -name "*.cpp" \) -exec clang-format -i {} +; find include -type f \( -name "*.h" -o -name "*.hpp" \) -exec clang-format -i {} +
